item.description:
All are welcome to join us for this INFORMATION PACKED meetUp!!!

Please come to learn more or share your knowledge, experiences, and thoughts regarding the reported dangers and/ or benefits of the CDC's recommended vaccination schedule. Discussion will focus on the Swine Flu vaccine.

We will "follow the money" and trace the politics and legality of hotly debated - yet still under the mainstream media's radar : HEALTH FREEDOM vs. MANDATED VACCINATION.


Especially if you have children, this meetUp is NOT TO BE MISSED. Please bring a friend. Please bring several friends. Refreshments will be served.


UPDATE:
We will be watching the feature length film SHOOT EM UP A DOCUMENTARY Directed by Judy Apicella

group.name: FREEDOM IS FUNDAMENTAL Book Club and Discussion Group

item.name: VACCINES, GOVERNMENT & YOU
